commitResults.messageBody:
* add bye command that exit the program
* print out the command if it is a command other than bye

commitResults.messageTitle: Add list and add commands to Duke

commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class: inputs is an array of inputs and a local variable in main method.

inputs array is an array that will be used across multiple commands, refactor it to be class variable can be shared across multiple methods.

* Refactor inputs array to be class variable
* Rename `inputs` array to `tasks`

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mark and unmark functionalities to Duke bot
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add Task class to encapsulate task's information
* Add mark and unmark commands

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for different types of task
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add Todo, Event and Deadline class
* Add `todo`, `event` and `deadline` commands

commitResults.messageTitle: Update testing input and expected output
Handling invalid input at each command
Update test input and expected output

commitResults.messageBody: Rename name of command handling method for better readability.

Tasks is not persistent.

Save the tasks to files so that we can retrieve in next program run.

* add a Storage class to help us handle file IO operation
* add encode and decode method to Task, ToDo, Deadline and Event classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Date parsing and formatting in deadline command
Add test for date parsing and formatting
Handle InvalidInputException when loading task from file

commitResults.messageBody:
Storage is not re-usable enough, need to specify file path every time.

* define filePath as instance variable so we can re-use it
* make loadTasks and saveTasks non-static

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code for better OOP design

commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are not empty when exit the program.

Clean up all the tasks once exit.

Classes are scattered around and it is very messy.

Organize them into different packages.

To ensure program is running expectedly, I added tests to test some of
the command classes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove extra line in initial output
Add JavaDoc comments to each file
commitResults.messageBody: To make the code more readable and people can understand better.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Find tasks functionality to Ted
commitResults.messageBody:
Users may have many tasks, find can help them locate the task quickly.

* Add find command to parser
* Implement find command function by checking task's description contain
  user's search string

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename i to index for better readability

commitResults.messageBody: To maintain code quality and standard across the team

We need GUI to provide better user experience.

* Add javafx package
* Add MainWindow
* Add DialogBox to show message of user and Ted

There are several parts of code is unused. Remove that will make
the code more readable and clean.

Remove the unused code.

It will reduce confusion when hand over to other programmers.

Assertions can help us to locate programmers' fault easily.

Add some assertions in code

Assertion can ensure programmers will not make careless mistakes
and cause runtime errors when release.

Refer to here: https://nus-cs2103-ay2223s1.github.io/website/se-book-adapted/chapters/errorHandling.html#assertions

Inconsistent naming will confuse programmers.

Change parameters' naming from `ui` to `uiController`.

Users do not know all the functionalities provided by our bot. A help
command will list out all the available commands to user so they can use
them.

* add a help command
* show all available commands and usages to user

Dialog box will cause the text overflow and cannot be seen by user. It
is not user-friendly.

* add a maximum width to label
* wrap label in TextFlow so we can create a dynamic width label box

The GUI now is not looking modern.

Improve the GUI by adding clean background with dropshadow.
Some system might not have the font.
